name: Space Cake
description:
A submission for Summer Jam 2014 with the theme Construction.

Construct a tower to space out of cakes frosting and gum (the latter act as joints).

Drag Cakes from the conveyor to drop them int the world, to add joints click them and then click the two cakes you want to connect.

Authors:

Noemi Staniszewska

Michał Stawski 

Tomasz Wiśniewski
